post.text: Hillary Clinton was for TPP before she was against it! She even called it the "gold standard" of trade agreements!

comment.author: Samantha
comment.text: Mr. Trump, I come from the Netherlands and we are not allowed to carry a gun. The bad guys still find a way to get guns and use them. Please tell Secretary Clinton that taking away guns is NOT going to help anything. Keep up the good work Sir!

replies.author: Trinity
replies.text: Yes. So true. Idk why people don't get that!

replies.author: Maxwell
replies.text: Taking our guns, like hitlary wants to do, is gonna leave America defenseless against Ob, her AND the muslims!! She WANTS America defenseless!!!! She's no good! Go Trump!!

replies.author: Sean
replies.text: Thank you Samantha for sharing. More people need to hear this! Gunless societies just don't work!
